alert.note: Alert for Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nassau and northwestern Duval Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 715 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ratliff, or 8 miles south of Callahan, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville International Arpt, Ratliff, Cisco Gardens and Nassau Village-Ratliff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
